mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.operation_flow_id, t.business_id, t.approve_user, u3.user_name AS approveUserName, t.function_id, t.submit_user, u2.user_name AS submitUserName, t.submit_time, t.remark FROM approve_operation_queue t LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_login = t.submit_user LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.user_login = t.approve_user where t.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from approve_operation_queue t where t.business_id = #{businessId}
